20101223000707.000|20101223000708.000|CC1|CLOGGING STREETS AND            
20101223000708.000|20101223000710.000|CC1|THREATENING HOMES IN            
20101223000710.000|20101223000711.000|CC1|HESPERIA.                       
20101223000711.000|20101223000713.000|CC1|RESIDENCES HERE ON WALNUT       
20101223000713.000|20101223000714.000|CC1|AVENUE TAKE MATTERS INTO        
20101223000714.000|20101223000715.000|CC1|THEIR OWN HANDS.

20101223000717.000|20101223000719.000|CC1|ONE RESIDENCE USED HEAVY        
20101223000719.000|20101223000720.000|CC1|MACHINERY TO CLEAR MUD FROM     
20101223000720.000|20101223000721.000|CC1|THE STREET AND ANOTHER USED
